mapper.select: SELECT ROWNUM, DN_ID, DN_TITLE, PRODUCT_UUID, PRODUCT_PATH, PRODUCT_EXTENSION, LIKE_COUNT FROM ( SELECT DB.DN_ID, DB.DN_TITLE, PI.PRODUCT_UUID, PI.PRODUCT_PATH, PI.PRODUCT_EXTENSION, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM DN_LIKE DL WHERE DB.DN_ID = DL.DN_ID) AS LIKE_COUNT FROM DN_BOARD DB JOIN DN_SELL DS ON DB.DN_ID = DS.DN_ID JOIN PRODUCT P ON DS.PRODUCT_ID = P.PRODUCT_ID LEFT JOIN PRODUCT_IMG PI ON P.PRODUCT_ID = PI.PRODUCT_ID ORDER BY LIKE_COUNT DESC -- Ensure the order is applied before ROWNUM ) WHERE ROWNUM <= 4

SELECT ROWNUM, EVENT_ID, EVENT_TITLE, EVENT_UUID, EVENT_PATH, EVENT_EXTENSION FROM ( SELECT EB.EVENT_ID, EB.EVENT_TITLE, EI.EVENT_UUID, EI.EVENT_PATH, EI.EVENT_EXTENSION FROM EVENT_BOARD EB LEFT JOIN EVENT_IMG EI ON EB.EVENT_ID = EI.EVENT_ID ORDER BY EB.EVENT_ID DESC ) WHERE ROWNUM <= 2
